A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a huge starwars fan my whole life I was disgusted with the last film and even more so with this film. My first intention is to call it a fan film but that would be disrespectful to fan films made by actual Star Wars fans that understand what Star Wars actually is. All Disney has done is make a couple of garbage movies packaged in Star Wars costumes and themes. This movie\, written and directed by pc principle himself\, is a good movie for little kids with no idea what Star Wars is or adults with no idea what  Star Wars is but \"saw a lightsaber with that guy that one time\". I wanted to leave 3 times during this film\, which chokes me up to even think about considering this is a STAR WARS film we are talking about.
